attributes.action: Stop the use of PRISM, and other underhanded surveillance tactics in any shape or form.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people of the UK, call for the government to proscribe the use of PRISM and other surveillance tactics used against its citizens.

We, the people of the UK, call for Cameron to lift the ban of Edward Snowden travelling on UK airlines.

We, the people of the UK, call for Cameron and his buddies to climb out of the arse of Obama's administration.
